answers.answer: My baby's belly is measuring three weeks bigger. According to my doctor and ultrasound he is perfectly fine. He is Just chunky ;)

Yep, if there's nothing else to be concerned about then baby is just a lil biggun.  Mine measured a week bigger everywhere except his tummy he was 2 wks bigger.  He was unremarkable, which is a good thing! :)

My first baby which is going to be 1 on the 30th,  measured 3 weeks larger also the whole pregnancy.  They even told me that he was to big and I might have to have a C-section.  Finally 2 weeks before my due date they sent me to yet another ultrasound they said he was ok. I was still I little scared because I didn't know exactly how jig he was, but when he was born he weighed 7 pounds 7 ounces . I had no issues or rips. So don't stress just go through the process and everything will work out as it should.  Good luck!!!!
Thank you ladies I have another ultrasound on Feb 9th...I hope her stomach is catching up...the rest of her is normal...

Usually when a unborn baby starts to measure large its due to gestational diabetes. My 1st pregnancy my babies belly was measuring at 36wks when i was barely 31wks but the head was small and everything seemed to be in preportion of the head except belly. Its definitely something they should keep a eye on and possibly check for diabetes again as it can just show up. Goodluck

My daughter's belly also measured 2 weeks larger and she was in fact large. She was 9.4 pounds. Had taken the diabetes glucose test twice with her and never a diabetic. This baby's belly is measuring 3 weeks larger and also no gestational diabetes. Just big healthy babies. :)

question: I had a ultrasound last week and today my doctor told me my babys stomach is measuring big...I'm 31+3 any of you mommies going thru this or have gone thru this? My ob said it might be nothing but I'm just so worried now...any feedback is appreciated...
title: ultrasound baby's stomach measuring big...
